When you’re looking to switch broadband providers, you should first find out a bit about what each provider has to offer. A huge range of Vodafone fibre broadband packages are available to choose from - something to suit everyone’s internet needs. Here, you can find out a bit more about them to help decide which to choose.

Vodafone fibre broadband packages

While Vodafone doesn’t work with an ADSL connection, it does have a huge range of fibre broadband plans available at different speeds and set-ups. With Fibre to the Cabinet (FTTC), Fibre to the Premises (FTTP), and mobile broadband options to choose from, you’ll never need to see slow speeds again.

Vodafone Gigafast and Ultrafast

The Vodafone Gigafast and Ultrafast packages are FTTP options so aren’t available in all locations across the UK yet. Click here to find out if you can get a Gigafast or Ultrafast package and find out more below.

Package Ultrafast 200 Pro Ultrafast 500 Pro Vodafone Gigafast 900 Pro
Price £45 £50 £60
Download speed 200Mbps 500Mbps 900Mbps
Upload speed (Openreach) 30Mbps 20Mbps 20Mbps
Upload speed (City Fibre) 200Mbps 500Mbps 900Mbps

Vodafone Gigafast is currently only available in 15 areas of the UK, including:

  1. Aberdeen (CityFibre)
  2. Birmingham (Openreach)
  3. Bournemouth (CityFibre)
  4. Bristol (Openreach)
  5. Cambridge (CityFibre)
  6. Coventry (CityFibre)
  7. Edinburgh (CityFibre)
  8. Huddersfield (CityFibre)
  9. Leeds (CityFibre)
  10. Liverpool (Openreach)
  11. Milton Keynes (CityFibre)
  12. Northampton (CityFibre)
  13. Peterborough (CityFibre)
  14. Southend-on-Sea (CityFibre)
  15. Stirling (CityFibre)

Some of these locations are still using the Openreach network, so won’t be able to see symmetrical speeds, however, most are connected by CityFibre so your upload and download speeds will be the same.

CityFibre is rolling out full-fibre to even more locations across the UK, so many more households may be able to get Vodafone Gigafast in the future.

When Vodafone Gigafast is available in your area, you can upgrade your current Vodafone broadband package for free with no cancellation charges.

Vodafone GigaCube

Vodafone GigaCube is a flexible alternative to traditional broadband. It’s a portable wireless router that transforms Vodafone’s 4G and 5G networks into WiFi, connecting your devices at speeds of up to 1Gbps.

Add-ons and extras

When comparing broadband providers, it’s worth looking into what else they can offer you on top of your standard broadband package.

Mobile, broadband, and TV deals

Vodafone is typically known for its mobile deals but, by bundling your mobile, Apple TV, and broadband together, you could save a lot more each month.

If you sign up for a Pay Monthly Mobile plan alongside your broadband, you could save £3 off your monthly bill and a 15% discount on any additional SIM cards. With Vodafone Together, you will also receive instant and guaranteed trade-in value for your old mobile.

When you opt for Vodafone Pro Xtra, you can take advantage of a free Apple TV 4K box to watch Ultra High Definition films, shows and box sets. New Apple TV+ customers will also benefit from a free 3-month subscription.

Buy One, Give One

If you have both your mobile and broadband plans with Vodafone, you’ll be helping out those living in Digital Poverty.

The Buy One, Give One initiative works with The Trussell Trust, an anti-poverty charity that helps support people in financial distress.

For every Vodafone Together household, Vodafone will give someone in need 20GB of data and unlimited calls and texts for up to a year. This will be free for both you and the recipient, who stay connected thanks to you.

Vodafone also works with a number of different charities to help end digital poverty and helps customers donate their old tech to help disadvantaged children access remote learning, connect with loved ones, and stay safe.

Find out more about everyone.connected

The Vodafone Broadband app

With the Vodafone Broadband app, you can take control of your WiFi hub and internet usage to make the most of your broadband package.

The app pairs with your router to improve your online experience, boost your speeds, and control your network.

With the app, you can:

  • Boost device speeds
  • Set custom WiFi schedules
  • Share your WiFi connection using a QR code
  • See which devices are connected to your network
  • Block devices from connecting
  • Set up a guest network
  • Personalise your settings
  • Run diagnostic tests
  • View your bills
  • Get support through a live chat service
